pages.text: This is a $(l:programming/conditions)Condition/$ widget.$(p)The $(thing)Condition: Fluid/$ widget allows you to (remotely) check tank(s) or fluid block(s) in the connected $(l:programming/area)Area/$ widget for a certain amount of fluid. It will only count the fluid allowed by a connected $(l:programming/liquid_filter)Fluid Filter/$ widget (omit the filter to allow every fluid).
